foggy adjective
(THOUGHT)
confused and unable to think clearly: Side effects include headaches, nausea, weakness, and foggy thinking.
not remembering something well, or not knowing much about something : I get foggier on exact dates as I get older. If you're a bit foggy on gardening without chemicals, this book should help.
